analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#451-470) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#461-464)

CocaCoinaCrowdsale.mintTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(addressToSend,tokensToMint) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.Crowdsale (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#427-444):
	External calls:
	- tokenCap = token.cap() (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#442)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bonus (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#442-444)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#451-470):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#461-464)
	External calls sending eth:
	- forwardFunds() (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#465)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- amountRaised (/unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol#467-470)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/43/0x9502874bf7856df4f28383d761beab4832b83e35.sol:
